pageProduct.name: Vital Pea Protein Slim & Trim Powder 500g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Our New Vital Slim & Trim protein formula is specifically designed to assist people with weight management. It contains the higest quality European pea protein mixed with L-Carnitine and thermogenic spices ginger, turmeric and cayenne pepper. It helps to kick start your metabolism, curb cravings and assist in long term weight management in combination with healthy eating and exercise.

Warnings

Consult your health care practitioner as individuals may vary.

Common Uses

Vital Slim & Trim formula is a protein formula designed to assist with long term weight management.

Ingredients

European Pea Protein (24.4g per 30g serve), L-Carnitine (2g per 30g serve), Cayenne Pepper (15mg per 30g serve), Ginger (300mg per 30g serve), Turmeric (1g per 30g serve) and natural chocolate flavour, thaumatic and monk fruit.

Directions

Dissolve 30g (two large heaped tablespoons) into 200mL of water, milk (non dairy is suggested) or juice of your choice, consume once daily.
